forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Video Player Upgrade!

comments.text: Putin just called and said "You gotta fix the video player". So we colluded and worked on integrating the latest, completely overhauled upgrade of our video player module...
... which is live now in version 144! (Your version: [version])
Please let us know how this works for you!
Gotta run, Xi Jinping is on the other line inquiring about user data... he promises a great social credit score to all Anylanders.
And v145.1: There's a new thing part More option "Light omits shadows", and a new togglable area right "Allow untargeted attract and repel"! Thx Kool & Jinx!
works great. is it possible for us to set a default video volume for our areas so visitors aren't blasted at full volume when they first enter?
when you context-laser a video surface, it appears. to make something a video surface, during creating, laser it & hit "..." -> screen -> "is screen"

thread.latestCommentText: when you context-laser a video surface, it appears. to make something a video surface, during creation hit "..." -> screen
